name: autoit.vim
summary: colorize AutoIt scripting language, from Hiddensoft
description:
syntax file for script languages AutoIt and AutoIt-GUI.
They are Open Source and freely available at "http://www.hiddensoft.com"
install_details:
The rules are the same as all the other syntax files:
    1) copy the file in your current vim syntax folder
    2) add the following line in your filetype.vim file, in the correct position, to recognize .au3 files by extension:
    "au BufNewFile, BufRead *.au3 setf autoit"
